text: Zoltán Kamondi (6 April 1960 - 17 March 2016) was a Hungarian movie director, actor, screenwriter and producer. He was born in Budapest, Hungary.Meghalt Kamondi Zoltán He was known for directing Paths of Death and Angels. Kamondi died on 17 March 2016 at the age of 55. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official Website Category:1960 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian screenwriters Category:Hungarian movie directors Category:Hungarian movie producers Category:Actors from Budapest Category:Writers from Budapest
title: Zoltán Kamondi
